text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/international-civil-aviation-organization-sex-or-gender defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
F FemaleA value which corresponds to female ('F') has been recorded in some context.
M MaleA value which corresponds to female ('M') has been recorded in some context. A value which corresponds to 'X' (any non-M or non-F value) has been recorded or the value is unspecified.
< XA value which corresponds to 'X' (any non-M or non-F value) has been recorded or the value is unspecified.

name: International Civil Aviation Organization Sex or Gender
description: The complete set of concepts used for exchange of the 'sex' value as represented in international travel documents as defined by Doc 9303: Machine Readable Travel Documents, Part 7: Machine Readable Visas published by the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO). Initially aligned with the Eighth Edition (2021).

concept.definition: A value which corresponds to female ('F') has been recorded in some context.
A value which corresponds to female ('M') has been recorded in some context. A value which corresponds to 'X' (any non-M or non-F value) has been recorded or the value is unspecified.
A value which corresponds to 'X' (any non-M or non-F value) has been recorded or the value is unspecified.
